column4: Funds appropriated to the school department to cover the costs of personnel, operating school department facilities, transportation, and other expenses necessary for providing public education in the district.
Funds appropriated to the school department to cover the expenses of educating students with disabilities.
The Town has accepted provisions of M.G.L. Ch. 110 whereby water and sewer costs are transferred to the tax levy.
All uses of money to provide town & school services. For more information, see the Glossary.
